headline: Three Reasons Why OTIS is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: While the S&P 500 is up 13% since May 2024, Otis (currently trading at $102.52 per share) has lagged behind, posting a return of 7.6%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
